sentences.sentence: He had a magnificent head of silvered hair.
The silvered metallic shades express the luxurious element and retain the aspect of the organic design.
sentences.translation: 闪亮的银色金属显现奢华的优雅，也保持圆润的曲线设计。

sentences.sentence: The years have silvered her hair.
sentences.translation: 岁月已使她的青丝似雪。
